name: Faces and Bodies
description: This project examines the social perception of bodies, in comparison to faces, focusing on the dimension structure from Oosterhof & Todorov (2008, PNAS).
citation: Morrison D, Wang H, Hahn AC, Jones BC, DeBruine LM (2017) Predicting the reward value of faces and bodies from social perception. PLoS ONE 12(9): e0185093.
